Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING!!!!
Reviews.Author: Matt "nodoubter"
Reviews.Content: I know that if you are reading this then you have probably spent time reading other reviews. I was a little skeptical about buying the camera because of those reviews. But i went with my instincts and wanted to try it out for myself. Boy am I glad that I did. Sure the picture quality on the camera's screen is a bit grainy. But as you transfer it to a computer you will see how outstanding the picture quality actually is. The touch to focus is amazing for taking portraits. I love this camera and would recommend either this one or the newer model (Nikon S70). I used to work for Best Buy in the camera department so I know that the S70 is an amazing camera. If you have time swing by the store and check it out. Or just trust me and buy either that camera or this camera. I guarantee that you will be completely satisfied with the pictures that you are taking. Hope this helped. :)

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: N. Bletsch "frustrated architect"
Reviews.Content: more of what makes nikon heads and shoulders above all other camera companies - well thought out and organized - excellent photo quality - good battery life and very compact - another great value and an excellent addition to our lives

Reviews.Title: A classy and easy-to-use camera!
Reviews.Author: Becca
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift, and this is my third digital camera. I previously owned a Canon Powershot and an HP Photosmart. In comparison to the previous two that I owned, this one beats them hands down. I really like this one for several reasons. It is a very small and compact camera that can easily fit into a purse or a pocket. The camera body is sturdy, and the finish is sleek and beautiful. The touch display is easy to read and understand, and quite simple to use. For camera users not used to operating a camera by touch display this can take a little getting used to, but I like it because it eliminates so many confusing buttons, and you can see your photos so much clearer. The display icons are relatively simple to understand once you've read the manual and know what each of them means. I love the picture quality even without the flash, and I love the fact that you can do a bit of retouching of your photos right there on the camera itself. Any further retouching can be done with your favorite photo editing program.With a lithium ion battery this camera has great battery life. I really like the fact that this camera doesn't use alkaline batteries, as you get a much longer battery life with the lithium ions. The included battery charger is very compact, and nice to use for travel. I would highly recommend getting a good and sturdy case for this camera, and also an LCD screen protector to protect the touch screen from smudges and scratches. This is a great camera for beginners and experts alike, and I am very happy with it. It was relatively simple to use right out of the box, but I would recommend careful reading of the manual before prolonged use. Overall, a great product! You won't be sorry that you bought this gem of a camera!

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected
Reviews.Author: Karishma
Reviews.Content: With all the hype, I expected the NIKON Coolpix to be a great purchase but it barely made it to "good". Sure, it takes pictures but the quality, menu format and overall user interface is very poor. I do not recommend this camera. Go for the Sony cyber-shot.

Reviews.Title: LAS FOTOS SON DE MUY MALA CALIDAD.
Reviews.Author: JSANDREA
Reviews.Content: ES UNA CÁMARA QUE PARA EL PRECIO QUE TIENE Y LA MARCA NO OBTIENES FOTOS DE BUENA CALIDAD. SOBRE TODO CUANDO HAY POCA LUZ. NO LA RECOMIENDO.

Reviews.Title: ALL LOOKS!
Reviews.Author: Joselin
Reviews.Content: This fancy looking thing was horrible. Only I am not sure if it was because I bought a refurbished one. Oh well I return this right away. Noisy and slow. Lens was bad. Pay a little more and get something better I guess good luck!

Reviews.Title: same lense problem
Reviews.Author: Brady's mom
Reviews.Content: We loved this camera. It's a great size and was great for our trip to Italy.  But it slowly died due to the common "lens cover error" that so many are also commenting on.  It would do that sometimes and then it got to the point where I can't turn the thing on anymore.  We had it for 4 years, so maybe I shouldn't complain.  But I am going to spend less money this time, knowing that these things just don't last.

Reviews.Title: I was shocked I thought Nikons where good cameras
Reviews.Author: Ms. Tiffany Michelle Fletcher
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for christmas, when we took it out and took our first picture, and was shocked at how poor the picture quality was.  We paid $250 for this camera thinking it was worth it because of the rep. of nikon, but the picture quality was equal to a $99 camera that we bought from walmart couple years earlier which is not a popular brand.  We are thankful that the company we bought it from allowed us to return it.  We ended up going with a sony camera.

Reviews.Title: Rave review, but...
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey K. Ericson
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT camera.  I bought it for my wife to carry around.  She is not a gadget geek, but she is nuts about this camera, and will show it off to anyone who will listen.  The stylus and drawing feature is really great, and she uses that all the time.  When she shops for clients, she takes a picture of the product in the store, and then scribbles the price and some notes on the image with the little stylus.  It is very handy.The reason it gets 4 stars instead of an enthusiastic 5 is the lens cover is defective and we're having to repair the camera after only about a month of use.  Also, the battery life seems to be erratic - sometimes we'll get well over a hundred shots on one charge, and sometimes less than a day.I'd also highly recommend (insist) that you purchase a case for this camera to protect the display and keep it from getting turned on inadvertantly.  Nikon's model works pretty well.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S60
Reviews.Author: Lana Spence "57 chevy girl"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this camera and got up to speed the first day!  It was a Christmas gift and this was the only place I could find the color (bronze) she wanted.  It arrived very fast and shipping charges were surprisingly low.  Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Amy J. Frost
Reviews.Content: This camera is awsome .so easy to use an download images.  You can edit right on the camera before downloading. Our daughter loved it.

Reviews.Title: LOW QUALITY PICTURE
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS NOT GAVE ME THE QUALITY OF THE PHOTOS THAT I EXPECTED FROM NIKON LIKE AS ONE OF THE BETTER CAMARA'S MANUFACTURER. SORRY.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Bowers "CareBear"
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera! Especially if your taking snow pics!!! I LOVE it and you will to!

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches
5x optical Zoom-Nikkor glass lens; Optical VR Image Stabilization
3.5-inch high-resolution touch-panel LCD; customizable touch-panel display
Auto adjusts up to ISO 3200; Shutter and Blink Warning
Captures images to SD/SDHC cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix S60 10MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom (Platinum Bronze)
